title: Dinnerbone：小假放完了+下周开始制作1.9
author: ufof
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ufof 于 2015-2-22 00:32 编辑 

First of all，参考这个帖子：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-404694-1-1.html。

 
My plan is to get back to working on 1.9 next week, then take another week off to fly to GDC and give out as many hugs as I can.
Dinnerbone：我的计划是下周回到Mojang开始制作1.9，然后再请假一个星期去GDC（注：游戏开发者大会）再回来给大家抱抱。




Ah, back home and turned on my computer for the first time. Only about 300 emails to catch up on from that 10 day break, not too bad!
Dinnerbone： 啊，终于回到家并打开了电脑。300多条邮件在我的10天小假都不算是很多了！
